name: Jake Hunter Detective Story: Memories of the Past
name_original: Jake Hunter Detective Story: Memories of the Past
description:
In the dark corners and seedy backstreets of Aspicio City, one name brings with it fear and respect: Jake Hunter. From the towers of high finance to the gutters of organized crime, Jake's seen it all, and lived to tell the tale. His assistant Yulia Marks knows seven languages, but he only knows one: Justice.

Features

• More Mysteries to Solve! - Play through all five episodes, plus an all new original episode made specifically for Jake Hunter on Nintendo DS!
• Unleash The Jake In You! - Get ready for some hilarious and suspicious misadventures in five “Jake Hunter Unleashed!” comic episodes! Also included is an original comic episode added for this DS iteration of Jake Hunter!
• A Plethora Of Unlockables! - Uncover more passwords than before and unlock short stories, interviews with the developers, and much, much more!
